so to get flux box I would just atp get fluxbox^
there's things like gnome (ubuntu default), kde (kubuntu), windowmaker (xubuntu), and a few hundred others
they all have various ways of skinning (or lack thereof, for performence, etc)
most apps should make shortcuts automatically in the menus (which you should be able to drag to the desktop)
those that don't, you need to figure out how to launch them from the terminal (the name of the app is usually a good start), and then make a new menu entry using that command
alacarte will help you do that (menu editor)
launch synaptic, and search for it
the update-manager should stay on top of keeping everything up to date for the most part
